N1.Text: You don't look like your from around here.

1.Text: I have lived here my whole life

Text: Then you must know Mr. Bowler.

1.Text: Mr. Bowler is a good friend of mine!

Text: I have there's trouble brewing down there.

1.Text: Did I say Newton? I'm actually from Springville.

2.Text: I haven't heard about any trouble.

N4.Text: You Liar! There's ain't no Mr. Bowler, I made him up!

N5.Text: Don't you worry about it. Say, do you have something to eat? I'm starving.
